info.name: Dizipub Remove Ads - 2017
info.description: Removes multiple advertiments from pages. Tested with Chrome
info.additionalInfo:
* Supported Browsers : Chrome,Firefox,Opera
* Don't forget to check updates.

Change Log

Known Issues
